articles.title: 'Edgbaston provides joy in cricket's difficult week'
articles.description: Why there were so many positives on show at Edgbaston following a difficult week for cricket.
articles.content:
Women's Ashes 2023: ICEC report needs to be a catalyst for change
For England, it may not have been the desired result, but it certainly had the desired effect.
There was an all-female groundstaff.… [+3902 chars]

articles.author: sport
articles.title: Dramatic fall from grace: Shock as West Indies miss out on World Cup after Scotland loss
articles.description: The West Indies failed to qualify for the Cricket World Cup for the first time as the two-time champions slumped to a seven-wicket thumping by Scotland at the qualifying event on Saturday.
articles.content:
• The West Indies made unwanted history on Saturday after they failed to qualify for this year's 50-over World Cup for the first time.
  • The outcome will come as a massive shock to the Ca… [+3023 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
